snippet: A political adviser to Shinzo Abe, Japan’s prime minister, arrived in the North Korean capital Tuesday, but officials in Tokyo would not confirm or comment about the trip.
abstract: Isao Iijima, political aide to Japanese Prime Min Shinzo Abe, makes sudden, rare visit to North Korea; officials will not confirm reason for visit.
lead_paragraph: A political adviser to Shinzo Abe, Japan’s prime minister, arrived in the North Korean capital Tuesday, but officials in Tokyo would not confirm or comment about the trip.

headline.main: Japanese Aide Makes Rare Trip to North Korea
headline.print_headline: Japanese Aide Makes Rare Trip to North Korea
